description: Tech giant said Copilot for Security would be available worldwide next month under a pay-as-you-go licensing model.
title: Microsoft to Launch AI Assistant for Security Products

description: The EU law marks the world’s most comprehensive legislation yet on artificial intelligence, setting out sweeping rules for developers and new restrictions on how the technology can be used.
title: European Lawmakers Approve Landmark AI Legislation

description: In an exclusive interview with our columnist, CTO Mira Murati explains the company’s new Sora AI video tool and how it plans to roll it out.
title: OpenAI Made AI Videos for Us. These Clips Are Good Enough to Freak Us Out.
